attributes.action: make OFCOM force TV companies who make money from viewers telephone votes to publish the exact number of votes made for each contestant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: OFCOM should force all TV companies to publish the exact number of telephone votes made by the public for each individual contestant on such programmes as X-Factor and Strictly come dancing. They should also allow viewers to vote for free via a website.
